DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Older Patients Who Are Undergoing Treatment Cancer Their Family Caregivers
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Obtain quality life psychosocial data old patient undergoing treatment cancer family caregiver . OUTLINE : This pilot , cross-sectional study . Patients undergo 45-minute interview person phone provide demographic data complete quality life questionnaire , include Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy ( FACT ) , Spiritual tool , Quality Satisfaction Treatment ( QUEST ) , Profile Mood State ( POMS ) , baseline 3 12 month . Caregivers undergo 20- 30-minute interview person phone provide demographic data complete quality life questionnaire , include Caregiver Reaction Assessment ( CRA ) , Quest , POMS , baseline 3 12 month . Caregivers complete Quality Death Dying ( QODD ) questionnaire 2-3 month patient 's death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Not specify
